info.name: iOS Widget Integration
info.summary: Integrates iOS-style floating widget into main Nextcloud dashboard
info.description: This app integrates a beautiful iOS-style floating widget directly into the main Nextcloud dashboard. The widget provides AI chatbot assistance, conversation management, and quick access to all Nextcloud features. It appears on all pages and provides seamless integration with Talk, Files, Calendar, and other apps.
info.author: Nextcloud iOS Widget Team
